text:
e="preserve">Santiago Nsobeya Efuman Nchama (c. 1950 – July 2020) was an Equatoguinean politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea. Between 1999 and 2003, he was Minister of Foreign Affairs.
In July 2013, Nchama was named Second Vice-President of the Chamber of Deputies of the Parliament of Equatorial Guinea, alongside Francisca Tatchouop Belobe.
Nchama's death was reported on 8 July 2020, aged 70.
